thread.section_title: Event Mobile Tyres Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.event-tyres.co.uk
thread.title: Jaime Cassar
thread.title_full: Event Mobile Tyres reviewed by Jaime Cassar

author: Jaime Cassar
title: Jaime Cassar
text:
Event tyres porvided me with brilliant service when they came to change my tyres from winter back to normal ones.
- booking was simple and they had my details on record which saved time.
- they sent a text message in advance to let me know what time they would arrive.
- when they arrived theye got on with the job at hand and were happy to collect the tyres from my garage.
- when they were done, they took payment by debit card - all very efficient.
